name: @fox/imap
author: Brian White <mscdex@mscdex.net> - foxintelligence
description: An IMAP module for node.js that makes communicating with IMAP servers easy

scripts.release:major: ./node_modules/generate-changelog/bin/generate -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'changelog updated' && npm version major && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: ./node_modules/generate-changelog/bin/generate -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'changelog updated' && npm version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: ./node_modules/generate-changelog/bin/generate -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'changelog updated' && npm version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm publish
